title: Frozen pineapple and berry slush
ingredients: ['8 ice cubes', '250 g (9 oz) hulled strawberries, frozen', '250 g (9 oz) fresh pineapple chunks, frozen', '120 ml (4 fl oz) pineapple juice', '2 tbsp dried skimmed milk powder', '1 tbsp vanilla sugar or caster sugar, or to taste', 'sprigs of fresh pineapple mint to decorate (optional)']
